discourse_list.title: Reporting for Strategic Finance Core Unit - May, June, and July 2022

content.content: May  Continued efforts on standardizing accounting and financial close processes and best practices to be shared with the community Ongoing efforts to improve financial reporting quality and accuracy from on-chain data Engaging with multiple counterparties to source competitive offers for investing structures to deploy the PSM and improve asset productivity Finalized and scheduled the Q1 QSR  Met with several large MKR holders to discuss strategy and encourage delegation as part of ongoing investor relations efforts to reduce apathy Shared a long-term growth strategy for the future of DeFi with the community [Facilitated receiving a 1% airdrop of $VELO tokens to incentivize DAI liquidity on] Optimism([Signal Request] Incoming Velodrome Airdrop on Optimism - $VELO veNFT) Signal request to launch Maker Teleport with a 1 bps fee  May ALM Liquidity Update  Posted April Financials and Expenses  Ongoing proactive engagement with CUs to help with supplier sourcing and optimizing CU expenses Produced a lending market update in response to the rapidly deteriorating market conditions Created a query to explore what vault holders initially spend borrowed DAI on, with an additional version to showcase this on a monthly basis and an additional version that only includes vaults that are still active today.   June  Presented a cash flow update to the community, followed by a signal request for the community to select a target level of rNPI profitability to guide budget adjustments Supported and provided feedback to @hasu on the Simple MakerDAO plan. We are glad to see this plan and the End-Game plan start to share more and more similarities are the community continues to discuss how the DAO should evolve  Modeled DAI maturity to complement the DAO’s ALM framework leveraging TradFi methodologies  Reached out to all facilitators to provide the DAO with a confirmation of actual expenses, cash on hand & intent to retire excess DAI, forecast of expenses through Q3 end, and to return cash in excess of 3-month forecasted spend. Met with @cmooney to learn technical details of the liquidation system and brainstorm ideas for how to bring back liquidated users Identified and explored an opportunity to target DAO treasuries for DAI / vault demand growth. Built a treasury lead list and deck and shared these with the growth CU. Helped Backed Finance on their MIP6 proposal as an asnwer to the Declaration of Intent - Invest in short-term bonds approuved by community. Work on MIP65 in coordination with other CUs. Posted May Financials and expenses    July  Updated ALM Forecast that models the protocol’s balance sheet over the next 18 months based on CU assumptions  Revised the Makershire proposal based on community feedback, removing the multi-sig and empowering the community to determine the allocation Presented a framework for a budgeting re-allocation and Core Unit accountability (Signal Request thread), (YouTube presentation).  Researched a Crypto Banking System,  diving into the foundations that are needed to build a financial system on top of DeFi rails  Begin researching MKR holder decentralization which we will report to the community on a quarterly basis  Those interested in more frequent updates can access the Dune dashboard directly    Created a directory of Strategic Finance dashboards and queries, that we hope will be a one stop shop for community members to find all the on-chain data they need  Built a dashboard to analyze Oracle expenses and margin by ilk. @pipko will be sharing analysis and takeaways with the community shortly. Working on a new Delegate Compensation framework. We hope to share something with the community very soon! Posted June Financials and expenses  Provided a solution to provide mark-to-market accounting for a PSM wth volatile assets like Backed Finance MIP6. Continued work on MIP65 in coordination with other CUs. Developed logic to assign each vault to its originator, allowing for more holistic borrower-based views
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
